capital.common.actions.goBack: Used as label for button which navigates backwards to previous page, view or state
capital.common.fields.accountDescription: Label for a balance account description
capital.common.fields.accountID: Label for a balance account ID
capital.common.fields.annualPercentageRa: Label for the Annual Percentage Rate (APR)
Tooltip text that explains the Annual Percentage Rate as the cost of borrowing of a loan under Adyen Capital User Terms, expressed as an annual rate.
capital.common.fields.dailyRepaymentRate: Label for the daily repayment rate of a grant, which is a percentage
capital.common.fields.expectedRepaymentP: Label for expected repayment period of a grant
capital.common.fields.fees: Label for fees related to a grant
capital.common.fields.grantID: Label for a loan (a.k.a grant) ID
capital.common.fields.maximumRepaymentPe: Label for maximum repayment period of a grant
capital.common.fields.remainingAmount: Label for the remaining amount of a grant repayment
capital.common.fields.remainingFees: Label for the remaining amount of grant fees repayment
capital.common.fields.repaidAmount: Label for the repaid amount of a grant
capital.common.fields.repaidFees: Label for the repaid amount of grant fees
capital.common.fields.repaymentThreshold: Label for a grant repayment threshold that indicates the minimum periodic repayment to repay a grant on time
Label that describes what a repayment threshold means
capital.common.fields.totalFees: Label for the total fees of a grant
capital.common.fields.totalRepaymentAmou: Label for the total repayment amount of a grant
capital.common.loanProviderInfo.AU: This is a subtitle for capital component that will give an information to user based on specific location. Do not translate "Adyen"
capital.common.loanProviderInfo.CA: This is a subtitle for capital component that will give an information to user based on specific location. Do not translate "Adyen"
capital.common.loanProviderInfo.EU: This is a subtitle for capital component that will give an information to user based on specific location. Do not translate "Adyen N.V."
capital.common.loanProviderInfo.GB: This is a subtitle for capital component that will give an information to user based on specific location. Do not translate "Adyen N.V."
capital.common.loanProviderInfo.US: This is a subtitle for capital component that will give an information to user based on specific location. Do not translate "Adyen N.V."
capital.common.title: Title of an interface to view grants
capital.common.values.daysWithDaysLeft: Label for displaying the total days and the remaining days of a grant repayment
capital.common.values.numberOfDays: Label indicating a number of days
capital.common.values.numberOfMonths: Label indicating a number of months
capital.common.values.primaryAccount: Label indicating that a balance account is a primary one
capital.offer.common.errors.accountInact: Label indicating that an account holder is inactive
capital.offer.common.fundingRequestInfo: Label for the amount of funding that the user is requesting
capital.offer.common.repaymentInfo: Description that indicates a minimum grant repayment amount, the frequency of the repayment and the term end date
capital.offer.selection.actions.reviewOf: Label for a button that enables the user to review a previously selected offer
capital.offer.selection.title: Title of an interface that allows the user to select a grant offer
capital.offer.summary.actions.requestFun: Label for a button that enables the user to request funds
Label for a button that enables the user to request funds, when the request is in progress
capital.offer.summary.legalNotice.US.not: This is a legal text for capital offer summary. Do not translate "Adyen N.V." and "Adyen Credit Support Team", and never translate this text to Spanish, since we provide an official translation for it
capital.offer.summary.legalNotice.US.tit: This is a legal text for capital offer summary. Do not translate "Adyen N.V.", and never translate this text to Spanish, since we provide an official translation for it
capital.offer.summary.title: Title of an interface that allows the user to apply for a grant offer
Label indicating that the user need to take action
Label indicating that a requested grant is not approved or paid out
Label indicating that a grant is fully repaid
Label indicating that a grant is not payed out yet
Label indicating that a grant is cancelled from the user
Label indicating that a grant is defaulted and closed
capital.overview.grants.item.actions.cop: Label for a button that copies the loan (a.k.a grant) ID
capital.overview.grants.item.actions.sen: Label for a button that allows the user initiate procedures for repayment
capital.overview.grants.item.actions.sub: Label for a link that redirects the user to submit extra information
capital.overview.grants.item.actions.vie: Label for a button that enables the user to navigate to a screen with terms and conditions
capital.overview.grants.item.alerts.acti: Description that indicates that we need more information to process the funds.
Description that indicates that we need more information to process the funds by an specific date.
We need a bit more information to process your funds. Please complete these actions.
capital.overview.grants.item.alerts.offe: Description indicating when an offer expires
capital.overview.grants.item.alerts.sign: Information requesting the user to sign terms and conditions agreement before receiving funds.
Information requesting the user to sign terms and conditions agreement before receiving funds, while also indicating when the offer expires.
capital.overview.grants.item.amounts.rem: Label for the remaining amount of a grant repayment
capital.overview.grants.item.amounts.rep: Label for the repaid amount of a grant
capital.overview.grants.item.details.a11: Label for a button that toggles the visibility of the details of a loan (a.k.a grant)
capital.overview.grants.item.details.req: Label for an amount of funds requested by the user
capital.overview.grants.item.progressBar: Label for a progress bar that indicates progress of loan (a.k.a grant) repayment
capital.overview.grants.item.termEnds: Label for the end date of a term
capital.overview.grants.list.actions.new: Label for a button that enables the user to see a new offer
capital.overview.grants.list.tabs.a11y.l: Label for a group of tabs for navigating across different lists of grants
capital.overview.grants.list.tabs.labels: Label for a list of grants that are closed (finalized)
Label for a list of grants that are in progress
capital.overview.prequalified.actions.se: Label for a button that enables the user to see the options offered
capital.overview.prequalified.alreadyQua: Part 1 of a description that indicates that the user has been pre-qualified for business financing and the maximum amount of this financing
Part 2 of a description that indicates that the user has been pre-qualified for business financing and the maximum amount of this financing
capital.overview.repayment.accountDetail: Label for the beneficiary name of a bank account
Label for bank country or region
Label for bank account IBAN. IBAN here refers to "International Bank Account Number"
Label for bank account routing number
Label for bank account sort code
Displayed as title of a section showing bank account information
capital.overview.repayment.actions.copyA: Label for a button that copies the repayment bank account number
capital.overview.repayment.actions.copyB: Label for a button that copies the repayment beneficiary name
capital.overview.repayment.actions.copyI: Label for a button that copies the repayment IBAN (International bank account number)
capital.overview.repayment.actions.copyR: Label for a button that copies the repayment bank account routing number
capital.overview.repayment.actions.copyS: Label for a button that copies the repayment bank account sort code
Item of an instruction list about making bank transfer for loan repayment
Item of an instruction list about making bank transfer for loan repayment
Title of a section with instructions about making bank transfer for loan repayment
Item of an instruction list about making bank transfer for loan repayment
capital.overview.repayment.subtitle: Will be displayed as user guidance text alongside bank account information to enable the user proceed with repayment
capital.overview.repayment.title: Title of a section for making loan repayments
capital.overview.repayment.transferInstr: Title of a list of transfer instruments
common.actions.copy.labels.default: Will be displayed in a tooltip when a user hovers over a copy icon to let them know that clicking it will copy the text next to it
common.actions.copy.labels.done: Will be displayed in a tooltip when a user clicks the copy icon to copy some text
common.actions.copy.labels.errorCode: Label for a button that copies the error code for the displayed error
common.actions.download.labels.default: Used as a button label which calls the file download action
common.actions.download.labels.inProgres: Will be displayed as indication that a download action is in progress, usually followed by an ellipsis (…).
common.errors.contactSupport: Will be displayed when an error occurs to indicate customer to contact their support
common.errors.somethingWentWrong: Will be displayed as generic title for error messages, when an error occurs during an action.
common.filters.label: Used as label for a group of controls for filtering a list of records.
common.filters.mobile.label: Used as label for a button that toggles the visibility of filter controls for very small (mobile) screens.
common.filters.types.account.options.all: Used as label for dropdown menu option to select all available accounts.
common.filters.types.amount.range.betwee: Will be displayed as visible text indicating the current range for an amount filter between 2 amount values. Both the %{minAmount} and %{maxAmount} placeholder values are formatted as localised amounts.
common.filters.types.amount.range.max: Will be displayed as visible text indicating the current range for an amount filter up to a maximum amount. The %{amount} placeholder value is formatted as a localised amount.
common.filters.types.amount.range.min: Will be displayed as visible text indicating the current range for an amount filter starting from a minimum amount. The %{amount} placeholder value is formatted as a localised amount.
common.filters.types.amount.range.only: Will be displayed as visible text indicating the current (exact) amount set for an amount filter. The %{amount} placeholder value is formatted as a localised amount.
common.filters.types.date.calendar.label: Used as label for calendar grid visualizing the dates for a given calendar month. The %{monthOfYear} placeholder will be the localized month name (long form) with year, for example, September 2025 (for en-US)
common.filters.types.date.calendar.navig: Used as label for a group of controls for navigating through the months of a calendar.
common.filters.types.date.range.between: Will be displayed as visible text indicating the current range for a date filter between 2 dates. Both the %{fromDate} and %{toDate} placeholder values are formatted as localised dates.
common.filters.types.date.range.since: Will be displayed as visible text indicating the current range for a date filter starting from a specified date. The %{date} placeholder value is formatted as a localised date.
common.filters.types.date.range.until: Will be displayed as visible text indicating the current range for a date filter up to a specified date. The %{date} placeholder value is formatted as a localised date.
common.filters.types.date.rangeSelect.la: Used as label for select widget with preset time range options, allowing the user to select a time range for records that can be shown for each page.
common.inputs.file.actions.delete: Used as assistive technology button label for a button that removes an uploaded file. The filename placeholder will be replaced with the name of the file to be deleted (e.g: photo.png).
common.inputs.file.errors.disallowedType: Will be displayed as input validation error message if at least one uploaded file is of a file type that is not accepted.
common.inputs.file.errors.required: Will be displayed as input validation error message if at least one file is required but none has been uploaded.
common.inputs.file.errors.tooLarge: Will be displayed as input validation error message if at least one uploaded file is of a size larger than the maximum allowed file size.
common.inputs.file.errors.tooMany: Will be displayed as input validation error message if the number of uploaded files is more than expected.
common.inputs.file.labels.default: Used as button label for a file upload widget which enables the user to select one or more files to be uploaded.
common.inputs.select.placeholder: Will be displayed as default placeholder text for the trigger element of a selection widget.
common.modal.controls.dismiss.label: Used as a label for a button which closes an open modal dialog.
common.pagination.controls.limitSelect: Will be displayed to inform the user of the maximum number of records that can be shown for each page. The 'pageLimit' placeholder should be taken to be a number.
common.pagination.controls.limitSelect.l: Used as label for select widget with page limit options, allowing the user to select the maximum number of records that can be shown for each page.
common.pagination.controls.nextPage.labe: Used as label for a button which triggers fetching of records for the next page (if available).
Used as label for a button which triggers fetching of records for the previous page (if available).
common.pagination.label: Used as label for a group containing pagination information and controls for a list of records.
disputes.common.reasonCategories.adjustm: Label indicating that some amount adjustment led to the dispute.
disputes.common.reasonCategories.authori: Label indicating an authorization problem during payment as the reason for the dispute.
disputes.common.reasonCategories.consume: Label indicating that the consumer initiated the dispute.
disputes.common.reasonCategories.fraud: Label indicating fraud as the reason for the dispute.
disputes.common.reasonCategories.other: Generic label for dispute reasons not covered by the specific categories.
disputes.common.reasonCategories.process: Label indicating the dispute arose due to an error during processing.
disputes.common.reasonCategories.request: Label indicating that the dispute is initiated by a request for additional information.
disputes.common.statuses.accepted: Status label text indicating that the dispute has been accepted.
disputes.common.statuses.expired: Status label text indicating that the dispute is expired.
disputes.common.statuses.lost: Status label text indicating that the dispute was lost.
disputes.common.statuses.pending: Status label text indicating that the last action on the dispute is awaiting confirmation.
disputes.common.statuses.responded: Status label text indicating that the request for information has been responded to.
disputes.common.statuses.undefended: Status label text indicating that the dispute is yet to be defended.
disputes.common.statuses.unresponded: Status label text indicating that the request for information is yet to be responded to.
disputes.common.statuses.won: Status label text indicating that the dispute was won.
disputes.management.accept.chargeback.ac: Message confirming to users that a dispute was successfully accepted.
Label text for button that confirms acceptance of a chargeback dispute.
disputes.management.accept.chargeback.di: Disclaimer informing users that they agree to certain terms upon accepting a dispute.
disputes.management.accept.common.accept: Label text for button that confirms that the action to accept a dispute was successful.
disputes.management.accept.common.agree: Checkbox label used to explicitly confirm agreement to terms or conditions.
disputes.management.accept.requestForInf: Message confirming to users that a request for information was successfully accepted.
Label text for button that initiates the process for accepting a request for information
Disclaimer informing users that they agree to certain terms upon accepting a request for information.
disputes.management.common.actions.goBac: Button label used for navigating to the previous step.
disputes.management.common.actions.showD: Button label to display additional details about a specific dispute.
disputes.management.common.errors.notFou: Specific error message shown when a dispute cannot be found for the particular account holder that was specified in a search or request.
disputes.management.common.errors.unavai: Error message indicating that the system was unable to load the details of a specific dispute the user is trying to view.
disputes.management.common.title: Title for the section related to managing disputes.
disputes.management.defend.chargeback.fe: The information to tell user that they will pay a fee for every chargeback.
disputes.management.defend.chargeback.se: Description text for a select dropdown menu containing applicable dispute defense reasons as options.
disputes.management.defend.chargeback.su: Guidance text to communicate with user about their documents have been submitted and that it will take some time for the issuer to review them.
disputes.management.defend.common.action: Label for a button that allows the user to include an additional document that is not mandatory for the dispute process.
Label text for button that continues the ongoing process for defending the dispute.
Label for a button that allows the user to remove a document that is not mandatory for the dispute process.
Label text for button to submit dispute defense documents.
disputes.management.defend.common.defend: Label text for button that confirms that the action to submit defense documents for a dispute was successful.
disputes.management.defend.common.docume: Title text for section showing the document requirements for files to be uploaded.
Guidance text to inform user dispute defense documents should have only specified file formats with specified file size
Guidance text to inform user dispute defense documents should be in English
Guidance text to inform user dispute defense documents should be A4 or US letter size
Label for a specific document upload field indicating that submitting this particular document is not mandatory.
Label indicating a document that is required to be uploaded, in addition to other standard required documents.
Guidance text that will inform user they cannot change the defense documents after a submission.
disputes.management.defend.common.errors: Error message informing the user that the system was unable to process their request related to a dispute, and suggests retrying or contacting support for assistance.
Generic error message displayed to the user when an unexpected issue occurs during the process of defending a dispute.
disputes.management.defend.common.eviden: Title text for view that shows information on successful submission of dispute defense documents.
disputes.management.defend.common.inputs: Label for a dropdown menu where the user is prompted to choose the type of the document they intend to upload.

Generic error message displayed during the document upload process when an unspecified issue occurs. It prompts the user to verify that the documents they are attempting to upload comply with all stated requirements.
Input validation error message that appears if a user attempts to proceed with an action (e.g., submitting a dispute defense) without first uploading at least one required supporting document.

Input validation error message shown during file upload when a selected file exceeds the maximum size (indicated by %{size}) for its specific file type (indicated by %{type}). It instructs the user to select a smaller file.
Label for a dropdown menu where the user is prompted to choose the type of the reason for defending a dispute.
disputes.management.defend.requestForInf: Description text for a select dropdown menu containing applicable reasons as options.
Title for the section related to defending requests for information
disputes.management.details.actions.acce: Label text for button that initiates the process for accepting a dispute
disputes.management.details.actions.copy: Label for a button that copies the dispute reference
Label for a button that copies the merchant reference for a disputed transaction
Label for a button that copies the payment reference for a disputed transaction
disputes.management.details.actions.defe: Label text for action button that initiates the process for defending a chargeback dispute.
disputes.management.details.actions.down: Used as label for button which triggers the file download action for a dispute evidence file.
disputes.management.details.actions.subm: Label text for action button that initiates the process for submitting defense information requested.
disputes.management.details.alerts.autoD: Informative message indicating the dispute was automatically defended.
disputes.management.details.alerts.conta: Informative message indicating that the user isn't able to defend the dispute via the component and will have to reach out for support.
Informative message indicating that the user isn't able to resolve the fraud notification via the component and will have to reach out for support.
Informative message indicating that the user isn't able to respond to the request for information via the component and will have to reach out for support.
disputes.management.details.alerts.notDe: Informative message indicating that no action can be taken on the dispute and the user will have to reach out to support to find out more.
Informative message indicating the request for information was not responded to until it got expired and was lost as a result.
Informative message indicating the chargeback was not defended before the deadline and was lost as a result.
disputes.management.details.alerts.respo: Informative message indicating the deadline for responding to the dispute.
disputes.management.details.errors.downl: Error message displayed when an attempted action has failed, prompting the user to try the action again.
disputes.management.details.fields.accep: Label referring to the date a dispute got accepted.
disputes.management.details.fields.accou: Label for the account associated with the dispute.
disputes.management.details.fields.defen: Label showing the date on which the dispute was defended.
Label indicating the reason provided when defending a dispute.
disputes.management.details.fields.dispu: Label explaining why the dispute was created.
Unique identifier or reference number for the dispute.
disputes.management.details.fields.evide: Label referring to evidence submitted for a dispute.
disputes.management.details.fields.expir: Label referring to the date a dispute got expired.
disputes.management.details.fields.merch: Reference number provided by the merchant for tracking transactions.
disputes.management.details.fields.payme: Unique identifier or reference number associated with the disputed payment.
disputes.management.details.fields.reaso: Label referring to a standardized code explaining the dispute reason.
disputes.management.details.fields.respo: Deadline label indicating when a response to the dispute must be submitted.
disputes.management.details.issuerCommen: Will be displayed as title text (heading) for a text box containing comments from the issuer.
Used as label for button which truncates or hides parts of a large block of content.
Used as label for button which reveals truncated or hidden content.
disputes.management.details.types.charge: Label text for a chargeback dispute.
disputes.management.details.types.notifi: Label text for a fraud notification.
disputes.management.details.types.reques: Label text for a request for information.
disputes.overview.chargebacks.errors.lis: Message shown when no chargebacks match the current filters
disputes.overview.chargebacks.errors.upd: Suggestion telling the user to adjust filters or check again later for new chargebacks
disputes.overview.chargebacks.limitSelec: Used as label for select widget with page limit options, allowing the user to select the maximum number of chargebacks that can be shown for each page.
disputes.overview.common.actionNeeded.du: Displayed to inform the user about the due date (deadline date) for a dispute.
disputes.overview.common.actionNeeded.re: Will be displayed as information indicating the number of days left for the user to take action on a dispute.
Will be displayed as information indicating that the user has to take action on a dispute urgently (today).
disputes.overview.common.errors.listUnav: Error message shown when the system fails to load the list of disputes, for example, on an overview page.
disputes.overview.common.errors.unavaila: Will be displayed if the disputes overview widget cannot be rendered because the user's authorization could not be determined at a given moment.
disputes.overview.common.fields.currency: Label indicating the currency used in the disputed transaction.
disputes.overview.common.fields.paymentM: Payment method used in the original payment
disputes.overview.common.fields.reason: Reason why the dispute was created
disputes.overview.common.fields.totalPay: Label showing the full amount of the original payment related to the dispute.
disputes.overview.common.filters.a11y.la: Used as label for a group of controls for filtering the list of disputes.
disputes.overview.common.filters.types.s: Label text referring to a group of interactive controls for navigating through several dispute status groups.
disputes.overview.common.pagination.a11y: Used as label for a group containing pagination information and controls for a list of disputes.
disputes.overview.common.statusGroups.ch: Label text referring to chargeback disputes.
disputes.overview.common.statusGroups.fr: Label text used to categorize fraud alerts.
disputes.overview.common.statusGroups.on: Label text used to categorize disputes that are still ongoing or already closed.
disputes.overview.common.title: Will be displayed as title text (heading) for the disputes overview widget.
disputes.overview.fraudAlerts.errors.lis: Message shown when no fraud alerts match the current filters
disputes.overview.fraudAlerts.errors.upd: Suggestion telling the user to adjust filters or check again later for new fraud alerts
disputes.overview.fraudAlerts.limitSelec: Used as label for select widget with page limit options, allowing the user to select the maximum number of fraud alerts that can be shown for each page.
disputes.overview.ongoingAndClosed.error: Message shown when no disputes match the current filters
Suggestion telling the user to adjust filters or check again later for new disputes
disputes.overview.ongoingAndClosed.limit: Used as label for select widget with page limit options, allowing the user to select the maximum number of disputes that can be shown for each page.
payouts.details.errors.unavailable: Will be displayed as error message when the details of a payout cannot be shown to the user, probably due to insufficient permissions.
payouts.details.title: Will be displayed as title text (heading) for the payout details widget.
payouts.overview.filters.label: Used as label for a group of controls for filtering the list of payouts.
payouts.overview.generateInfo: The preparation of payout information happens at midnight (12:00 AM) in UTC timezone. Payout, in this context, refers to a user's money that gets paid into their designated bank account. UTC here refers to the Coordinated Universal Time, which is the reference origin (0) for other timezones.
payouts.overview.pagination.controls.lim: Used as label for select widget with page limit options, allowing the user to select the maximum number of payouts that can be shown for each page.
payouts.overview.pagination.label: Used as label for a group containing pagination information and controls for a list of payouts.
reports.common.types.payout: Used as label for "payout" reports. Payout, in this context, refers to a user's money that gets paid into their designated bank account.
reports.overview.errors.download: Will be displayed if an error occurs in the process of carrying out a file download action at any given moment.
reports.overview.errors.listEmpty: Will be displayed if there is no reports data available for the given search criteria.
reports.overview.errors.listUnavailable: Will be displayed if a network or server error occurs while trying to fetch reports data.
reports.overview.errors.retryDownload: Will be displayed if an action was attempted that cannot be completed at the given moment, but could possibly be completed at a later time.
reports.overview.errors.tooManyDownloads: Will be displayed if the number of initiated file download requests exceeds the number of downloads that can be processed within a given period of time.
reports.overview.errors.unavailable: Will be displayed if the reports overview widget cannot be rendered because the user's authorization could not be determined at a given moment.
reports.overview.filters.label: Used as label for a group of controls for filtering the list of reports.
reports.overview.generateInfo: The generation of reports happens at midnight (12:00 AM) in UTC timezone. UTC here refers to the Coordinated Universal Time, which is the reference origin (0) for other timezones.
reports.overview.list.controls.downloadR: Used as label for button which triggers the file download action for a report.
reports.overview.list.fields.reportFile: Used as column header in a table to label column of file download buttons
reports.overview.list.fields.reportType: Used as a column header that indicates the type of the report
reports.overview.pagination.controls.lim: Used as label for select widget with page limit options, allowing the user to select the maximum number of reports that can be shown for each page.
reports.overview.pagination.label: Used as label for a group containing pagination information and controls for a list of reports.
reports.overview.title: Will be displayed as title text (heading) for the reports overview widget.
transactions.details.actions.copyReferen: Label for a button that copies the reference ID of a transaction
transactions.details.actions.goToPayment: Used as a label of a button which links refund with the payment it belongs.
transactions.details.common.refundedStat: Used to indicate that a payment has been refunded up to the full amount.
Used to indicate that only a part of a payment has been refunded.
transactions.details.common.refundReason: Used to indicate that a transaction is repeat payment for a similar item.
Used to indicate that a transaction resulted from some kind of fraud activity.
Used to indicate an issue with some item or service that was paid for.
Used to indicate some other reason why payment should be refunded.
Used to indicate that the customer is the one requesting the refund.
transactions.details.errors.unavailable: Will be displayed as error message when the details of a transaction cannot be shown to the user, probably due to insufficient permissions.
transactions.details.refund.actions.back: Used as label for button which navigates backwards to previous page, view or state
transactions.details.refund.actions.refu: Will be displayed as text label for input that allows the user to enter the amount they want refunded.
Will be displayed as indication that a refund action is in progress, usually followed by an ellipsis (…).

Will be displayed as a button label informing the user of how much they are about to refund if they continue with the refund action. The %{amount} placeholder represents the refund amount formatted like so: $45.99
transactions.details.refund.alerts.inPro: Will be displayed as information to the user, notifying them that their refund is still being processed and no further action can be taken.
transactions.details.refund.alerts.refun: Will be displayed as subtitle if there is an error on refund action.
Will be displayed as title if triggering refund action is successful.
Will be displayed as subtitle if triggering refund action is successful.
transactions.details.refund.inputs.amoun: Will be displayed as validation error message if the inputted amount exceeds a maximum.
Will be displayed as validation error message if the amount input field is empty or invalid.
transactions.details.refund.inputs.reaso: Will be displayed as text label for selection widget that lets the user choose from a predefined set of refund reasons.
transactions.details.refund.processingIn: Will be shown to notify user about details of refund behavior.
transactions.overview.balances.labels.de: Label for a button that toggles the visibility of all available account balances (for various currencies) for the active account
transactions.overview.balances.lists.def: Label for a list of all available account balances (for various currencies) for the active account
transactions.overview.balances.tags.bala: Will be displayed as a tag indicating that the associated amount is an account balance.
transactions.overview.filters.label: Used as label for a group of controls for filtering the list of transactions.
transactions.overview.filters.types.amou: Used as label for a filter control that allows the user to specify a range of amounts.
transactions.overview.filters.types.pspR: Informative text displayed to the user to inform them about the date limitations of the filter.
Used as label for a filter control that allows the user to specify an exact or partial payment (PSP) reference. Do not translate PSP.
Placeholder text for input that allows the user to specify an exact or partial payment (PSP) reference. Do not translate PSP.
transactions.overview.pagination.control: Used as label for select widget with page limit options, allowing the user to select the maximum number of transactions that can be shown for each page.
transactions.overview.pagination.label: Used as label for a group containing pagination information and controls for a list of transactions.
transactions.overview.totals.labels.defa: Label for a button that toggles the visibility of all the total incoming and outgoing amounts (for various currencies) for the current set of transactions
transactions.overview.totals.labels.inco: Label for a button that toggles the visibility of all the total incoming amounts (for various currencies) for the current set of transactions
transactions.overview.totals.labels.outg: Label for a button that toggles the visibility of all the total outgoing amounts (for various currencies) for the current set of transactions
transactions.overview.totals.lists.defau: Label for a list of all the total incoming and outgoing amounts (for various currencies) for the current set of transactions
transactions.overview.totals.lists.incom: Label for a list of all the total incoming amounts (for various currencies) for the current set of transactions
transactions.overview.totals.lists.outgo: Label for a list of all the total outgoing amounts (for various currencies) for the current set of transactions
transactions.overview.views.insights: Label text referring to a view that displays the detailed transactions summary for a specified period.
transactions.overview.views.transactions: Label text referring to a view that displays a list of transaction records.
transactions.overview.viewSelect.a11y.la: Label text referring to a group of interactive controls for navigating through several transactions views.
